episodes.title: Episode 67 - Elizabeth Struhs & The Saints Cult
episodes.description: Summary: This conversation delves into the tragic case of Elizabeth Struhs, an eight-year-old girl who died due to medical neglect stemming from her family's extreme religious beliefs. The discussion covers the family's background, the cult they were involved in, the neglect Elizabeth faced when she fell ill, and the subsequent legal consequences for her parents and other cult members. The conversation highlights systemic failures in child protection and the need for changes to prevent such tragedies in the future.
